title: As industry lauds 5G potential, businesses will need to justify investment
description: Tipped to become the dominant mobile technology in 2029, 5G adoption amongst enterprises will require strong use cases, but these currently may be difficult to replicate.

title: How to make tech more sustainable: Five practical ways to make it happen
description: Sustainability is finally on the boardroom agenda, but many organizations are still not taking proactive action. Professionals must make a step change now.

title: This USB-powered soldering iron is amazing
description: This is everything I've ever wanted from a soldering iron.

title: Laid-off technology pros are launching their own ventures -- and competing with their previous employers
description: 63% of tech workers report they have started their own company post-layoff, according to a recent survey.

title: My search for the ultimate Apple Watch Ultra strap is over
description: It's been a long search, but I've finally found a rugged, high-quality third-party strap for the Apple Watch.

title: Microsoft just got paranoid again and you may need to laugh (or weep)
description: When will Microsoft stop getting upset when anyone so much as considers looking elsewhere?

title: American Airlines and United just made a startling change (it's not all it seems)
description: It's amazing what you can do with technology if you put your mind to pleasing customers. Even if you may have ulterior motives.

title: Android has a hidden feature to help you sleep better. Here's where to find it
description: If you have trouble sleeping without calming sounds, Android can help.

title: I tried this $12 gadget that's an Amazon Choice. I remain disturbed
description: Apparently, many people buy these things. I wonder how it makes them feel.
